data.title: Robarts Arena
data.meta_description: Event Centers in 3000 Ringling Blvd, Sarasota, FL 34237
data.text:
About

The Sarasota Fairgrounds offers a variety of facilities for use for small to large functions. Robarts Arena, Ken Clark Auditorium, and the Potter Building will accommodate meetings, weddings, reunions, trade shows, craft fairs, sporting events or concerts. The building's maximum capacities range from 150, 299 to 5,000. The expansive 65 acre complex also boasts RV rallies, Medieval Fair, and other outdoor activities. The annual Sarasota County Fair is held annually in March.
